function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zone-based lockdown for Covid-19 suppression","Impact":"Potential resistance from local communities, economic impacts, mental health consequences of isolation","Mitigation":"Community engagement, financial support, mental health resources","Technologies":"Digital surveillance, contact tracing apps, telemedicine","People":"Local communities, businesses, individuals","Owner":"Local government, public health agencies, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for pandemic consequences in architectural and urban design education","Impact":"Unprepared architects and designers, inadequate infrastructure for future pandemics","Mitigation":"Integration of pandemic-focused curriculum, interdisciplinary training, research on pandemic-resilient design","Technologies":"Remote learning platforms, virtual reality design tools, online research databases","People":"Architecture and urban design students, educators, professionals","Owner":"Educational institutions, professional organizations"},{"Description":"Shift in social behavior and neighborhood dynamics due to Covid-19","Impact":"Change in social interactions, neighborhood usage, and preferences for public spaces","Mitigation":"Community engagement, flexible urban design, promoting local open spaces","Technologies":"Community social platforms, urban planning software, virtual engagement tools","People":"Local communities, urban planners, architects, public health experts","Owner":"Local government, urban planning authorities, community organizations"}]}
